description: This file defines a React component called AuthRoute that acts as a route guard for a web application's frontend. It manages authentication state based on context, environment variables, and Supabase session checks. The component handles different authentication modes (guest vs strict) and redirects appropriately.

methods.name: AuthRoute({ children })
methods.description: React functional component acting as a route guard that enforces authentication based on context and environment settings. It conditionally renders children or redirects to signin.
